CommentsContent: Argh. Most recently I ordered the "Black Olive" - which is a unique and nice shade of very dark olive green. But I received plain black. They've got good stitching and an excellent pocket that has a pen slot but is still just wide enough to slip my Galaxy Note 8 in the main part for easy use in speaker phone or podcast mode.  These are my go-to T-shirts now, and are quickly replacing my disintegrating collection of Beefy-Ts.Note that some very popular colors of Dickie's T-shirts are available in 2-packs that come out cheaper per shirt - WARNING - they are not the same weight or overall quality as the single-packed T-shirts.
